mapper.insert: INSERT INTO facility(admin_code, facility_name, facility_content) VALUES (#{admin_code}, #{facility_name}, #{facility_content})
mapper.select: SELECT f.facility_code facility_code, f.admin_code admin_code, f.facility_name facility_name, f.facility_content facility_content, i.image_code image_code, i.image_file image_file FROM facility f JOIN image i ON f.facility_code=i.facility_code WHERE f.facility_code = #{facility_code}

SELECT f.facility_code facility_code, f.admin_code admin_code, f.facility_name facility_name, f.facility_content facility_content, i.image_code image_code, i.image_file image_file FROM facility f JOIN admin ad ON f.admin_code=ad.admin_code JOIN image i ON f.facility_code=i.facility_code WHERE ad.company_code=#{company_code}
